CustomField.description: Patient status codes for Status = Discontinued
CustomField.formula: CASE(PJN_New_Therapy_Status__c, "Discontinued", CASE(PJN_New_Therapy_Sub_Status__c, "Requirement Not Met - Patient Residency","DC01", "Unable to Reach Patient on Required Contact, Max Attempts","DC02", "Unable to Reach Prescriber on Required Contact, Max Attempts","DC03", "Patient Decision - Alternate Therapy","DC04", "Patient Decision - Financial","DC05", "Patient Decision - MyRare Only","DC06", "Patient Decision - Other","DC07", "Prescriber Decision - Alternate Therapy","DC08", "Prescriber Decision - Financial","DC09", "Prescriber Decision - Coverage Effort","DC11", "Prescriber Decision - Other","DC13", "Patient Medical Delay, Max Delay","DC15", "No Route of Access","DC16", "Patient Deceased","DC17", "Patient Off Therapy","DC18", "Other","DC19", "Reported Reaction","DC20", "Clinical Trial","DC21", "Administration Barrier","DC22", "No coverage: Appeals exhausted and PAP ineligible","DC23", null), null)
CustomField.label: Status Code - Discontinued
